import React from "react"; import firebase from "firebase"; import socialAuth from "../fireAuth"; function Login(props) { const { email, password, setEmail, setPassword, handleLogin, handleSignup, hasAccount, setHasAccount, emailError, passwordError, } = props; const handleOnClicks = async (provider) => { const res = await socialAuth(provider); console.log(res); }; var googleProvider = new firebase.auth.GoogleAuthProvider(); var githubProvider = new firebase.auth.GithubAuthProvider(); return (
setEmail(e.target.value)} />

{emailError}

setPassword(e.target.value)} />

{passwordError}

{hasAccount ? ( <>

Don't have an account ? setHasAccount(!hasAccount)}>Sign Up

) : ( <>

Have an account ? setHasAccount(!hasAccount)}>Sign In

)}
); } export default Login;
